onboarding.photoRequest: Make a photo of your face at good lighting. Send it here â€” we'll fix your point A.
onboarding.timerMessage: Now let's get started with implementing the potential of our meeting. It's time to remember the sacred. What are the boldest ambitions, desires, or dreams you haven't yet been able to achieve? To answer this question for yourself, move to a quiet secluded place and direct your attention to your body. Stay in your thoughts and feelings about this question for the next 3 minutes. P.S. Click the button to...
onboarding.feelsMessage: Try to briefly describe which ambitions are still not realized. And tell more about what thoughts and feelings you had in your body. Describe the brightest feelings and specify where in your body they manifested. For example: felt tightness in the chest and sharp pain in the shoulders on the background of anxiety and missed opportunities. You can send a voice message (duration 1-2 minutes) or text.
onboarding.feelsMessageDeclined: It seems something went wrong â€” maybe you still don't trust me enough. Try to describe your feelings and experiences on the topic of ambitions more thoroughly, inspired by the experiences of those who have already done this.
onboarding.triggerMessage: It is impossible to miss all the opportunities, only temporarily lose contact with the one who forms them.
onboarding.effects_selection:
We have

â€” income growth analysis

â€” optimal location analysis

â€” compatibility analysis in personal/business relationships

â€” future child analysis and much more 

ğŸ” I predict all this based on your physiognomy. On 1-3 photos.

Currently, you have 3 free options. Choose one of themğŸ‘‡ğŸ»

onboarding.creatingHypothesis: âœ¨ Creating a hypothesis for you
onboarding.final:
I can do so much more! I can tell you what you should be, what awaits you in the future, what your growth points are in finances and health, what your child can become, what compatibility you have with a partner or business partner and much more!..

And most importantly â€” strangers will no longer be strangers. Just one photo is enough, and we'll analyze them to the boneğŸ˜‰

You can purchase more analyses or invite friends to the app and get free analyses)

How do you want to proceed?

onboarding.finalMessage: Now you know what blocks are hindering your ambitions and what potential is hidden within. What's next? Choose one of the options below to continue your journey to unlocking your potential:
onboarding.shareMessage: ğŸ Share the bot with friends! Your referral link: {{referralLink}} âœ¨ Special offer: When 7 friends join using your link, you'll get one month subscription for free! Friends invited: {{referralCount}}/7
onboarding.shareText:
Hello

I'm sharing with you an insight assistant based on ii - Aruai. It's based on neuro research. It helps to discover and get out of the limitations of the subconscious in an eco-friendly way. I tried it and really liked it

onboarding.voice_question: 5/5 Imagine you're taking the first step towards a big goal, and you're being harshly criticized, including by loved ones. Record a voice message here about what thoughts first come to mind and where sensations appear in your body, describe in detail what they are like: ğŸ’­For example: First thoughts "I'm not good enough", "Maybe it really is too early". Where it squeezes the most, in the temples, throat, chest area or elsewhere ğŸ¤ Press and hold the voice message recording button

menu.title: â“ Support Menu
menu.welcome: Choose what you need help with:

help.info: ğŸ¤– Frequently Asked Questions What are your analyses based on? My analyses are based on the concepts of physiognomy and kinetics. Yes, they are still considered unscientific, but I believe and know that it works, so I help specifically within this methodology. How can this be useful to me? Have you ever noticed that people with similar appearances behave in similar ways? I have â€” many times. The face is a mirror of our character, and it changes along with it. Through facial features, we can recognize deep character traits that we may not be aware of. This helps grow in relationships, finances, health (according to psychotype). Also, you can analyze relationship compatibility through faces, as well as learn more about strangers! Do you store my photos? My analyses? No, we delete your photos immediately after analysis. That's why we ask you to upload a photo from scratch each time. We also don't store analyses â€” they are deleted after 1 day. How can I get tokens for free? 1) every 3 invited friends give you 1 free token! 2) in the referral program section you can find telegram channels, subscribing to which you'll get 1 more bonus token Can I get a refund? If you've already spent tokens â€” no, the service has already been provided. We spend money on AI computing power to generate analyses for you. How can I contact you? I have a proposal/barter? Write to us at @avato_memory_help_bot

links.info: ğŸ”— Useful Links ğŸŒ Official Website: https://avato.ai ğŸ“± Telegram Channel: @avato_news
